text: > We received your ransom note. What is next?
rationale: The victim is stating the receipt of the ransom note and inquiring about the next steps.

text: > Congratulations, you have passed a surprise information security audit and become a victim of ransomware. Currently, we are preparing the list of data we took from your network. For now you have to know that dealing with us is the best possible way to settle this quick and cheap. Keep in touch and be patient with us. We will reach out to you soon.
rationale: The attacker is informing the victim about the situation and suggesting a course of action.
The attacker is providing a list of data taken, which is factual information.

text: > These files were taken from your network prior to encryption. You can pick 2-3 random files from the list and we will upload them to this chat as a proof of possession. To prove that we can properly decrypt your data you can upload 2-3 encrypted files to our chat and we will upload decrypted copies back.
rationale: The attacker is making a conditional offer to decrypt the data if the victim provides proof of possession.
The attacker is proposing terms for the negotiation, appealing to the victim's sense of fairness and value.
The attacker is providing additional factual information about the data taken.

text: > Here is additional data we took from some of your trusts.
rationale: The attacker is informing the victim about more data taken, which is factual information.
The attacker is providing factual information about the total amount of data taken.

text: > Yes, these two list are everything we took.
rationale: The attacker is confirming the completeness of the data taken, which is factual information.

text: > Can we use a separate chat for the conversation going forward?
rationale: The victim is inquiring about the possibility of using a different communication channel for the negotiation.

text: > Yes, I will send a new chat ID shortly.
rationale: The attacker is making a conditional offer to change the communication channel if the victim requests it.
The attacker is providing a link to a secure communication platform for the negotiation.
